main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright yellow light moving rapidly and silently over Cornwall, Vermont, for 7 to 8 minutes on 27 February 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright yellow light that changed shape and left a trail., It exhibited unusual flight characteristics., The sighting lasted for about 7 to 8 minutes., Witnesses included both military and civilian personnel., The behavior of the object was suggested to be due to reflection or atmospheric effect rather than a true solid object.
witness description: civilian attendees at a wedding party
